thread.section_title: How to Be a Forest Steward | Forest Stewardship Council
thread.title: Buy FSC-Certified Products | Forest Stewardship Council
thread.title_full: Buy FSC-Certified Products | Forest Stewardship Council

title: Buy FSC-Certified Products | Forest Stewardship Council
text:
FSC has joined 100+ NGOs supporting the #Together4Forests movement.
Protect the future of our forests with one simple action
Change starts with you
Your purchases have tremendous power to shape the marketplace. Buying FSC-certified products sends companies a clear message: Forests matter.
With thousands of FSC-certified products to choose from, it’s never been easier to take action for forests and the communities that depend on them.
The label that puts forests first
Every FSC label is backed by a set of rigorous standards that help protect forests and the people who depend on them worldwide.
Learn more about our labels →
Our forest-friendly picks
Fashion
Explore products →
Furniture, Homeware and DIY
Explore products →
Beauty and Wellness
Explore products →
Hobbies, Sports and Recreation
Explore products →
Paper, Stationary and Packaging
Explore products →
More sustainable shopping is just a click away
We are working with online and physical retailers around the world to make it easier than ever to shop for FSC-certified products. FSC is a proud partner of Amazon’s Climate Pledge Friendly programme. Consumers from the United States, France, Germany, Italy, Spain, and the UK can find over 50,000 FSC-certified products.
Shop now →
Stewardship doesn’t stop at shopping
Buying FSC-certified products is just one of the many ways you can help forests flourish.
Learn more →
Let us know your thoughts
We are trying out this new initiative to inform consumers on sustainably sourced products. If you are FSC certificate holders or promotional licence holders, please let us know what you think about this idea.
Contact us →
